name: show_mobile_node_cluster
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Mobile Nodes Server Configuration,Hardware Selection,Node Supplier Server1,Additional Hard Disk (Mobile Server),Optional DVD (Mobile Server),Trackball (Mobile server),Mobile Nodes Cluster,Display Size (Mobile Server),Display Supplier (Mobile Server),Serial Board - 8 port PCI (0-1),Ent_ace_t_desk_tpm,Mobile Server Serial Board Expansion- 8 port Module (0-3),Mobile Station Access License (0-5))*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory (Mobile Server))*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (Mobile Server))*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (Mobile Server))*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory (Mobile Server))*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Mobile Nodes Cluster:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
